:::{.question type=multiple_choice points=1}
Solve for $x$: $x^2 - 4 = 0$

- [x] $x = \pm 2$
- [ ] $x = 4$
- [ ] $x = 2$
:::

:::{.question type=short_answer points=1}
What is the quadratic formula for $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$?

- [x] $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$
:::
